page.title: 11Springburn Park,Balornock
page.content: Glasgow is a city which is very famous for its many parks.A Glasgow man named{James Reid}owned a large house and grounds in Springburn.When he died near the end of the 19th century he left his house and grounds to the city of Glasgow to be used as a public park.This park was called Springburn Park.It is a big park with lots of trees and grassy places.Lots of people go to the park to have picnics especially during the summer months.In the park there is always plenty to do because there are tennis courts,bowling greens,putting greens and football pitches to play on.There are also swings and adventure playgrounds for the children to play on.The park has two ponds which are very popular with visitors to the park.One is a boating pond and the other is a home for wildlife.
